header.name: chaos/preprocessor/comparison/not_equal.h
header.author: Paul Mensonides
header.overview: The header defines an inequality operator.

macro.abstract: The macro compares to values for inequality.

usage.param: The first operand. Valid values range from 0 to .
The second operand. Valid values range from 0 to .

macro.para: If x is not equal to y, this macro expands to 1. Otherwise, it expands to 0.
